about.content:
I'm an enthusiastic and creative Fullstack software engineer and developer who love bringing solutions to real world cases. with over 3years of experience in web development, I have been able to hone my skills and expertise.
As a passionate Developer with a strong foundation in modern web technologies, I am eager to contribute my skills to a dynamic team. WIth my exceptional skill in creating internet recognizable serivices, and user focused solutions, I believe I will be of great use in a like minded workforce.

portfolioSection.description: Explore some of my recent projects that showcase my skills in web development, design, and problem-solving.
portfolioSection.headline: My Portfolio

projects.excerpt:
Quizeen is a modern, interactive quiz-taking application built to make learning engaging, simple, and enjoyable. Designed and developed by Paul (aka Asterixh), the platform offers a smooth and intuitive user experience powered by a robust full-stack architecture.

Users can explore a variety of course-based quizzes, each featuring streamlined multiple-choice questions (A–D options). The system supports user authentication, customizable preferences, theme control, and optional quiz result saving — all optimized for performance, accessibility, and responsiveness.

Under the hood, Quizeen is engineered using production-grade practices, ensuring strong security, clean state management, and maintainable code. It’s a showcase of my expertise in building scalable, feature-rich web applications using modern technologies.

meta.description: Quizeen is an interactive learning platform featuring course-based quizzes, account customization, authentication – built using Next.js
meta.ogDescription: A modern, interactive quiz platform with authentication, streamlined quizzes, and customizable user settings.
meta.title: Quizeen – Interactive Quiz Taking Platform
meta.twitterDescription: A modern, interactive quiz platform with authentication, streamlined quizzes, and customizable user settings.

projects.title: Quizeen – Interactive Quiz Taking Platform

projects.excerpt:
WorkUp Cards is a fast and user-friendly business card creator designed to let anyone generate a high-quality card in minutes. Users simply choose from modern, creative, or corporate templates, fill in their details, and instantly download a ready-to-use high-resolution image.

The platform removes the need for design skills entirely, offering clean, professional layouts and an intuitive interface. From customizable colors and typography to instant export through HTML-to-image rendering, WorkUp Cards showcases my ability to build performant, interactive tools focused on accessibility, responsiveness, and excellent user experience.

meta.description: WorkUp Cards is a simple, fast, and free tool for creating professional business cards. Choose a template, customize your details
meta.ogDescription: Create professional business cards instantly with customizable templates and high-res downloads.
meta.ogTitle: WorkUp Cards – Create Your Business Card in Minutes
meta.title: WorkUp Cards – Create Your Business Card in Minutes
meta.twitterDescription: Create professional business cards instantly with customizable templates and high-res downloads.
meta.twitterTitle: WorkUp Cards – Create Your Business Card in Minutes

projects.title: WorkUp Cards – Business Card Generator

projects.excerpt:
The WorldTimeSage is a time-tracking platform. including world clock, customizing themes, exploring timezone details, using offline capabilities, managing permissions, and installing the PWA

it also includes a documentation, which demonstrates my ability to design comprehensive documentation systems with clean navigation, search-friendly structure, and accessible layouts. The project highlights skills in interface design, structured content architecture, UX writing, and building support tools for modern web applications.

meta.description: WorldTimeSage, covering global time tracking, search features, timezone details, offline support, personalization, accessibility, and PWA installation.
meta.ogDescription: A complete help center for WorldTimeSage, guiding users through global time tracking, timezone details, offline usage, and customization.
meta.ogTitle: WorldTimeSage Help Center – Complete User Guide
meta.title: WorldTimeSage Help Center – Complete User Guide

projects.title: WorldTimeSage

projects.excerpt:
AsterMail is a flexible, high-performance email delivery service built with Node.js, Express, and Nodemailer. It supports dynamic SMTP configuration, autoresponse workflows, structured validation, logging, and robust error handling — making it ideal for SaaS platforms, dashboards, notification systems, and automated communication tools.

This project showcases my backend engineering expertise: designing secure APIs, implementing scalable email transport logic, building validation pipelines, and integrating reliable delivery flows suitable for production environments.

meta.description: A flexible Node.js email service with dynamic SMTP, autoresponse support, validation, and secure API architecture.
meta.ogDescription: A Node.js and Express powered email service with dynamic SMTP configuration, autoresponses, validation, and secure API architecture.
meta.title: AsterMail – Dynamic Email Delivery Service
meta.twitterDescription: A flexible Node.js email service with dynamic SMTP, autoresponse workflows, validation, and secure API architecture.

projects.title: AsterMail

projects.excerpt:
Geemex is an immersive gaming landing page template built with Vue.js, designed to showcase a futuristic survival game. The template highlights intense gameplay, tactical combat, cooperative multiplayer, hero stories, and in-game collectibles, offering a fully responsive and visually engaging user experience.

It demonstrates my ability to create interactive, high-performance frontend templates with modern UI design, clear content hierarchy, pricing tiers, subscription options, and promotional sections for gaming projects.

meta.description: Geemex is a Vue.js gaming landing page template that features immersive gameplay highlights, etc. Perfect for promoting survival and multiplayer games.
meta.ogDescription: A Vue.js landing page template showcasing a futuristic survival game with gameplay features, heroes, and subscription options.
meta.title: Geemex – Gaming Landing Page Template
meta.twitterDescription: A Vue.js landing page template showcasing a futuristic survival game with gameplay features, heroes, and subscription options.

projects.title: Geemex – Gaming Landing Page Template

projects.excerpt: GitFinder is a simple and intuitive GitHub user search application built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. Users can quickly look up GitHub profiles, view public repositories, and get basic information about developers. The project demonstrates frontend development skills, responsive design, and dynamic data handling using APIs without a backend.

meta.description: GitFinder is a GitHub user search tool built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap that allows users to view profiles, repositories, and user info quickly.
meta.ogDescription: A GitHub user search application using HTML, CSS, JS, and Bootstrap to find profiles and repositories.
meta.title: GitFinder – GitHub User Finder
meta.twitterDescription: A GitHub user search application using HTML, CSS, JS, and Bootstrap to find profiles and repositories.

projects.title: GitFinder – GitHub User Finder

projects.excerpt: Anonfly is built on the principle of "Privacy by Design." It leverages cryptographic identities and end-to-end encryption to ensure that conversations remain between participants.

meta.description: a secure, real-time, and anonymous chat application

servicesSection.headline: My Specialization
servicesSection.intro: I offer comprehensive web development services tailored to meet your business needs. From responsive websites to complex web applications, I deliver high-quality solutions that drive results.

items.description: Custom, responsive websites built with a mobile-first mindset to ensure fast performance and seamless user experience across all devices.
items.label: Website Development
